Package shapes3d

Interface Summary
IShape You can create a class to represent your own shape.
 

Class Summary
Anchor As the name suggests this class acts as an Anchpr for other shapes.
BezShape A 3D shape generated by a 2D bezier curve in the XY plane being rotated 360 degrees about the Y axis.
BezTube This class represents a tube that follows a Bezier curve in 3D space.
Box A box shape where the length breadth and depth can be set by the user.
Cone A 3D cone shape.
Ellipsoid An ellipsoid is a spherical shape where the radius in the 3 primary directions (x,y,z) are not necessarily the same.
Helix This class represents a helix along the Y axis.
Mesh2DCore Support class providing draw and texture methods for those shapes using a grid mesh.
ie BezierShape, Ellipsoid, Helix, Toroid and Tube.
Mesh2DCoreWithCaps This class extends the Mesh2DCore class to enable the use of end caps for the Tube and Helix classes.
PathTube  
Shape3D Abstract class - the base for all 3D shape classes.
Terrain A simple terrain class.
Toroid This class represents a toroid (doughnut / donut shape)
Although the toroid is circular as viewed from the end, the 'tube' cross-section can be elliptical by setting different radii in the vertical and horizontal directions.
Tube This class represents a tube its length along the y [0,1,0] axis.
Xshape This is a simple way for users to add their own shapes so they work as part of the Shapes3D library.
